Title: Death on the Nile
Actors: Peter Ustinov, Jane Birkin, Lois Chiles, Bette Davis
Plot: Based on the Agatha Christie novel, our favourite Belgian detective, Hercule Poirot, is on a cruise up the Nile. He is surrounded by an interesting assortment of characters, including a wealthy heiress and her husband, on their honeymoon. It appears that everyone hates the heiress...
